sentences: Chaired by José Romero, this group discussed the improvement of guidelines for the preparation of national communications from non-Annex I Parties.
Parties agreed to use text prepared by the G-77/China as the basis for discussion.
SBI Chair Estrada underscored the need for clear indications within the guidelines of the COPs intentions with regard to additional financial inputs by the GEF.
Parties discussed which articles to take into account in the guidelines objectives.
enb_long_title: Eighth Conference of the Parties to the UN Framework Convention on Climate Change
